div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 556 Durazzo (Durrës; anc. Dyrrhachium), (356) Albania, 1894 Burial: before 250 B.C. (Ceka); 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 52 AR Apollonia: 2 dr. Dyrrhachium: 50 dr. Disposition: Vienna 48 † von Krekich-Strassoldo, MonatsblNumGesWien 1898, pp. 276-8, illus. Münsterberg, MonatsblNumGesWien 1917, p. 259 Ceka, Studia Albanica 1 (1966), pp. 218-9
